sk1.name: Ether Shock
sk1.desc: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

sk2.name: Hex
sk2.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

sk3.name: Shackles
sk3.desc: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

sk4.name: Mass Serpent Ward
sk4.desc: Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage that increases per level.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
